content: Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 09 Dec 2018How should I pay for my hotel overseas (Rupiah)? DBS Debit Card, CIMB Credit Card or get a Youtrip card since DBS Debit and CIMB Credit card will incur more fees, e.g. foreign transaction fees ?2 answersAnswerBump0

Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardAnswered on 11 Jun 2019I would definitely recommend topping up Youtrip before you fly in indonesian rupiah, to save the transaction fees, and also to avail to attractive exchange rates!Get S$10 free money after your first top up on Youtrip with this link! https://youtrip.app.link/HUI%20JUN1288990 comments1

Xinyi Lum, Content Strategist at SeedlyLevel 5. GeniusUpdated on 10 Dec 2018There are some insightful reviews here https://seedly.sg/reviews on the several multi-currency accounts that have popped up recently, along with those tied to banks. I personally use YouTrip because I can skip the fees!0 comments0
